Package com.elmenus.task.drones.repository

Interface DroneRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Drone,Integer>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Drone,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<Drone,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<Drone,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Drone,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Drone>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Drone,Integer>
@Repository public interface DroneRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Drone,Integer>
Repository interface for managing Drone entities.

  • Method Details

    • findByState

      List<Drone> findByState(DroneState state)
      Retrieves a list of drones by their state.
      Parameters:
      state - The state of the drones to retrieve.
      Returns:
      A list of drones with the specified state.

    • findBySerialNumber

      Drone findBySerialNumber(String serialNumber)
      Retrieves a drone by its serial number.
      Parameters:
      serialNumber - The serial number of the drone to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The drone with the specified serial number, or null if not found.

    • findByBatteryCapacityLessThanAndStateNot

      List<Drone> findByBatteryCapacityLessThanAndStateNot(Integer batteryCapacity, DroneState droneState)
      Retrieves a list of drones with battery capacity less than the specified value and not in the specified state.
      Parameters:
      batteryCapacity - The battery capacity.
      droneState - The state of drones to exclude.
      Returns:
      A list of drones with battery capacity less than the specified value and not in the specified state.
